definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
street stall with goods laid out on the ground
to apportion expenses, responsibilities etc/to demand contributions
to lay one's cards on the table
lit. to set up a stall on the ground/fig. to start up a new business
to spread out/(fig.) to share equally

sentences.english: After supper, Cliff spread out his books before him to start reviewing his lessons.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后克里夫把书本摊在面前开始复习功课。
九龙旺角区菜市场猪肉摊。

sentences.english: Many experts also like to recommend such a low - cost method of apportionment.
sentences.chinese: 很多专家也喜欢向大家推荐这种摊低成本的方法。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I can find the stinky tofu stand?
sentences.chinese: 你可以告诉我，哪里可以找到臭豆腐摊吗？

sentences.english: After school I sat in the office and stared at the records spread out before me.
sentences.chinese: 放学后，我坐在办公室里盯着摊放在我面前的档案。

sentences.english: Check out the betel-nut stand near the corner, and try some if you dare.
sentences.chinese: 如果你够胆量，就试试角落里的那家槟榔摊。

sentences.english: There roadside burrito stands, burrito every morning to many people.
sentences.chinese: 路边有个卷饼摊，每天早上来卷饼的人很多。

sentences.english: He selected the right chisels from a pile laid out beside him.
sentences.chinese: 他从摊在身边的一堆凿子中挑出适用的几把。

sentences.english: Dogs spend all day sprawled on the most comfortable piece of furniture in the house.
sentences.chinese: 狗找一个房子里最舒服的角落摊一整天。

sentences.english: I seem to remember some guy in NYC opening a boazi stand.
sentences.chinese: 我记得听说过有啥人在妞儿越是开过一个包子摊啊。

sentences.english: Boy:Hi Brittany. What are you doing with all of your clothes on your bed?
sentences.chinese: 布坦妮，你把所有衣服摊在床上做什么？

sentences.english: Iced lemon drink from the drink stall, sweet and heavenly in this heat.
sentences.chinese: 来自饮料摊的冰柠檬饮料，在酷暑里甜甜的透心凉。

sentences.english: " and then spreads the hand of 10 cards, assorted into melds, on the table.
sentences.chinese: 然后将手中的十张牌按组排列摊在桌上。

sentences.english: Itinerant bike repairmen can be found on almost every street.
sentences.chinese: 流动的自行车修理摊几乎在每条街道都可以找到。

sentences.english: Time to stock up at the green pepper stand and strawberry shortcake stand.
sentences.chinese: 是时候在绿甜椒摊和草莓奶油酥饼摊前买点什么了。

definition: street stall with goods laid out on the ground
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to set up a stall/to maintain a large staff and organization
